tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EventInvitations (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    organizer_name VARCHAR(100),
    attendee_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(150),
    attendee_email VARCHAR(255),
    invitation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE invitations (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_id INT,
  event_name VARCHAR,
  event_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
  attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR,
  preference VARCHAR,
  past_interactions INT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
 interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 attendee_id UUID REFERENCES attendees(attendee_id),
 event_id UUID REFERENCES events(event_id),
 interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
 interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE event_attendees (
    attendee_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    organizer VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE past_interactions (
    interaction_id INT,
    attendee_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);
